A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first 1/3 of the movie was prequel bad\, the last 2/3 was great. I think the critic score is way too high and the audience score is way too low. It’s a solid movie but not a great movie. They took a lot of chances\, which is fine... I guess. My big problems were cheesy jokes and bad dialogue + some unanswered questions that I have a feeling won’t be answered.
